actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge, and Assateague Island National Seashore, Accomack County, Va., and Worchester County, Md., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge, and Assateague Island National Seashore, Accomack County, Virginia, and Worchester County, Maryland, as the Assateague Islands Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge, and Assateague Island National Seashore, Accomack County, Va., and Worchester County, Md., as wilderness.
